member.name: T:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart
member.summary: Extension methods to create charts with fluent API.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.Create``1
member.summary: Creates a new chart.
member.typeparam: Specify the chart type to create.
member.returns: The newly created instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithId``1(``0,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the HTML node ID for this chart.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.UsingDataFrom``1(``0,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the URL used to retrieve data for the chart.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithHeight``1(``0,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the height of the div tag to preserve space for the chart. Set this value to null to allow the chart to dynamically size.
member.param: An CSS/HTML compatible string that represents a height.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.AllowResizing``1(``0)
member.summary: Enable automatic resizing when the containing element resizes (default: false). This has a significant performance impact, so it is disabled by default.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.PreventResizing``1(``0)
member.summary: Disables automatic resizing when the containing element resizes.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithXKey``1(``0,System.String)
member.summary: Sets a string containing the name of the attribute that contains date (X) values. Timestamps are accepted in the form of millisecond timestamps (as returned by Date.getTime() or as strings in the following formats: •2012 •2012 Q1 •2012 W1 •2012-02 •2012-02-24 •2012-02-24 15:00 •2012-02-24 15:00:00 •2012-02-24 15:00:00.000 Note: when using millisecond timestamps, it's recommended that you check out the dateFormat option. Note 2: date/time strings can optionally contain a T between the date and time parts, and/or a Z suffix, for compatibility with ISO-8601 dates.
member.param: The name of the XKey attribute.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithYKeys``1(``0,System.String[])
member.summary: Sets the list of strings containing names of attributes that contain Y values (one for each series of data to be plotted).
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithLabels``1(``0,System.String[])
member.summary: Sets the list of strings containing labels for the data series to be plotted (corresponding to the values in the YKeys option).
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithHoverState``1(``0,Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.ChartHoverState)
member.summary: Set the hover behavior. to 'False' to always show a hover legend. Set to 'True' or 'Auto' to only show the hover legend when the mouse cursor is over the chart. Set to 'Always' to never show a hover legend.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithAxis``1(``0)
member.summary: Enables drawing the x and y axis.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithoutAxis``1(``0)
member.summary: Disables drawing the x and y axis.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithGrid``1(``0)
member.summary: Enables drawing the horizontal grid lines.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithoutGrid``1(``0)
member.summary: Disables drawing the horizontal grid lines.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithGridTextSize``1(``0,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Set the point size of the axis labels (default: 12).
member.param: The point size of the axis labels.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithGridTextColor``1(``0,System.String)
member.summary: Set the color of the axis labels (default: #888).
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithGridTextFamily``1(``0,System.String)
member.summary: Set the font family of the axis labels (default: sans-serif).
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithGridTextWeight``1(``0,System.String)
member.summary: Set the font weight of the axis labels (default: normal).
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithLineColors``1(``0,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Sets the colors for the series lines/points.
member.param: Array containing colors for the series lines/points.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithLineWidth``1(``0,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Sets the width of the series lines, in pixels.
member.param: Width of the series lines, in pixels.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithPointFillColors``1(``0,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Sets the colors for the series points. By default uses the same values as LineColors.
member.param: An array of colors for the series points
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithPointSize``1(``0,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Sets the diameter of the series points, in pixels.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithPointStrokeColors``1(``0,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Sets the colors for the outlines of the series points (#ffffff by default).
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithYmax``1(``0,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the, maximum bound for Y-values. Alternatively, set this to 'auto' to compute automatically, or 'auto [num]' to automatically compute and ensure that the max y-value is at least [num].
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithYmin``1(``0,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the minimum bound for Y-values. Alternatively, set this to 'auto' to compute automatically, or 'auto [num]' to automatically compute and ensure that the min y-value is at most [num]. Hint: you can use this to create graphs with false origins.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithLineSmoothing``1(``0)
member.summary: Enables line smoothing.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithoutLineSmoothing``1(``0)
member.summary: Disables line smoothing.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithParseTime``1(``0)
member.summary: Enables time/date parsing for X values.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithoutParseTime``1(``0)
member.summary: Skips time/date parsing for X values, instead treating them as an equally-spaced series.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithPostUnits``1(``0,System.String)
member.summary: Sets a string value (eg: '%') to be appended to all y-labels.
member.param: A value to add after all units on the Y axis.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithPreUnits``1(``0,System.String)
member.summary: Sets a string value (eg: '$') to prefix all y-labels.
member.param: The value to be prefixed to all units on the Y axis.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithDateFormat``1(``0,Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.CallbackFormatter)
member.summary: Sets the callback formatter that accepts formats dates for display as chart labels.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithXLabels``1(``0,Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.xLabel)
member.summary: Specifies the x axis labeling interval. By default the interval will be automatically computed.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithXLabelFormat``1(``0,Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.CallbackFormatter)
member.summary: A format callback that accepts date objects and formats them for display as x-axis labels. Overrides the default formatter chosen by the automatic labeler or the xLabels option.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithXLabelAngle``1(``0,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Sets the angle in degrees from horizontal to draw x-axis labels.
member.param: The angle in degrees from horizontal.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithYLabelFormat``1(``0,Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.CallbackFormatter)
member.summary: A format callback that accepts y-values and formats them for display as y-axis labels.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithGoals``1(``0,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Single})
member.summary: Sets a list of y-values to draw as horizontal 'goal' lines on the chart.
member.param: An array of Y values used to set the goal lines.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithGoalStrokeWidth``1(``0,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Width, in pixels, of the goal lines.
member.param: The width of the goal lines in pixels.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithGoalLineColors``1(``0,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Sets the array of color values to use for the goal line colors. If you list fewer colors here than you have goals lines, then the values will be cycled.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithEvents``1(``0,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Single})
member.summary: Sets a list of x-values to draw as vertical 'event' lines on the chart.
member.param: An array of X values used to set the event lines.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithEventStrokeWidth``1(``0,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Width, in pixels, of the event lines.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithEventLineColors``1(``0,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.param: The width of the event lines in pixels.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithContinuousLine``1(``0)
member.summary: Null values will break the line and undefined values will be spanned. Note: in v0.5.0, this setting will be removed and the behavior will be to break lines at null values.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithoutContinuousLine``1(``0)
member.summary: Null and undefined values in a data series will be ignored and lines will be drawn spanning them. When set to true, null values will break the line and undefined values will be spanned. Note: in v0.5.0, this setting will be removed and the behavior will be to break lines at null values.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithFillOpacity``1(``0,System.Nullable{System.Double})
member.summary: Sets the opacity of the area fill color. Accepts values between 0.0 (for completely transparent) and 1.0 (for completely opaque).
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithLineBehavior``1(``0)
member.summary: Sets items to be overlaid on top of each other.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithoutLineBehavior``1(``0)
member.summary: Sets items to be stacked.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithBarColors``1(``0,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Sets the colors for the series bars.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.AsStacked``1(``0)
member.summary: Draw bars of multiple series stacked vertically.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.AsUnstacked``1(``0)
member.summary: Draw bars of multiple series side by side.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithColors``1(``0,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Sets the colors for each of the donut segments. Note: if there are fewer colors than segments, the colors will cycle back to the start of the array when exhausted.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithFormatter``1(``0,Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.CallbackFormatter)
member.summary: Sets a callback format that will translate a y-value into a label for the center of the donut.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithBackgroundColor``1(``0,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the background color of the chart.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.Chart.WithLabelColor``1(``0,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the color of the label in the center of the chart.
member.returns: An updated instance of the chart.

member.name: T:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.xLabel
member.summary: Specifies the x axis labeling interval. By default the interval will be automatically computed. The following are valid interval strings:

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.xLabel.Value
member.summary: Gets/sets the string value expected by the Morris.js library.

member.name: F:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.xLabel.Decade
member.summary: Specifies the X-Axis label interval will be one decade.

member.summary: Specifies the X-Axis label interval will be one year.

member.summary: Specifies the X-Axis label interval will be one month.

member.name: F:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.xLabel.Day
member.summary: Specifies the X-Axis label interval will be one day.

member.name: F:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.xLabel.Hour
member.summary: Specifies the X-Axis label interval will be an hour.

member.name: F:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.xLabel.ThirtyMinute
member.summary: Specifies the X-Axis label interval will be 30 minutes.

member.name: F:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.xLabel.FifteenMinute
member.summary: Specifies the X-Axis label interval will be 15 minutes.

member.name: F:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.xLabel.TenMinute
member.summary: Specifies the X-Axis label interval will be 10 minutes.

member.name: F:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.xLabel.FiveMinute
member.summary: Specifies the X-Axis label interval will be 5 minutes.

member.name: F:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.xLabel.Minute
member.summary: Specifies the X-Axis label interval will be one minute.

member.name: F:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.xLabel.ThirtySecond
member.summary: Specifies the X-Axis label interval will be 30 seconds.

member.name: F:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.xLabel.FifteenSecond
member.summary: Specifies the X-Axis label interval will be 15 seconds.

member.name: F:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.xLabel.TenSeconds
member.summary: Specifies the X-Axis label interval will be 10 seconds.

member.name: F:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.xLabel.FiveSecond
member.summary: Specifies the X-Axis label interval will be 5 seconds.

member.name: F:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.xLabel.Second

member.name: T:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorAreaChart
member.summary: Represents a Morris Area chart. Area charts take all the same options as line charts but are shaded under the lines.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorAreaChart.BehaveLikeLine
member.summary: Gets/sets a value that determines if the items are overlaid on top of each other (true) instead of stacking them (false).

member.name: T:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorBarChart
member.summary: Represents a Morris bar chart.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorBarChart.BarColors
member.summary: Array containing colors for the series bars.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorBarChart.Stacked
member.summary: Set to true to draw bars stacked vertically.

member.name: T:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorChart
member.summary: Base interface for all razor charts.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorChart.ChartHeight
member.summary: Gets/sets the height of the div tag to preserve space for the chart. Set this value to null to allow the chart to dynamically size.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorChart.DataUrl
member.summary: The URL to the data to plot. This is an array of objects, containing x and y attributes as described by the XKey and YKeys options. Note: ordering doesn't matter here - you can supply the data in whatever order works best for you.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorChart.Library
member.summary: Gets the chart library used by this instance represents.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorChart.Type
member.summary: Gets the type of chart this instance represents.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorChart.Resize
member.summary: Set to true to enable automatic resizing when the containing element resizes (default: false). This has a significant performance impact, so it is disabled by default.

member.name: T:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorDonutChart
member.summary: Represents a razor donut chart.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorDonutChart.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets/sets the background color of the chart.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorDonutChart.Colors
member.summary: An array of strings containing HTML-style hex colors for each of the donut segments. Note: if there are fewer colors than segments, the colors will cycle back to the start of the array when exhausted.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorDonutChart.Formatter
member.summary: Gets/sets a callback format that will translate a y-value into a label for the center of the donut.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorDonutChart.LabelColor
member.summary: Gets/sets the color of the label in the center of the chart.

member.name: T:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorLineChart
member.summary: Represents a Morris Line chart.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorLineChart.ContinuousLine
member.summary: When set to false (the default), all null and undefined values in a data series will be ignored and lines will be drawn spanning them. When set to true, null values will break the line and undefined values will be spanned. Note: in v0.5.0, this setting will be removed and the behavior will be to break lines at null values.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorLineChart.DateFormat
member.summary: A callback formatter that accepts formats dates for display as chart labels.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorLineChart.EventLineColors
member.summary: Array of color values to use for the event line colors. If you list fewer colors here than you have lines in events, then the values will be cycled.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorLineChart.Events
member.summary: A list of x-values to draw as vertical 'event' lines on the chart.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorLineChart.EventStrokeWidth
member.summary: Width, in pixels, of the event lines.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorLineChart.FillOpacity
member.summary: Change the opacity of the area fill color. Accepts values between 0.0 (for completely transparent) and 1.0 (for completely opaque).

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorLineChart.GoalLineColors
member.summary: Array of color values to use for the goal line colors. If you list fewer colors here than you have lines in goals, then the values will be cycled.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorLineChart.Goals
member.summary: A list of y-values to draw as horizontal 'goal' lines on the chart.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorLineChart.GoalStrokeWidth
member.summary: Width, in pixels, of the goal lines.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorLineChart.LineColors
member.summary: Array containing colors for the series lines/points.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorLineChart.LineWidth
member.summary: Width of the series lines, in pixels.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorLineChart.ParseTime
member.summary: Set to false to skip time/date parsing for X values, instead treating them as an equally-spaced series.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorLineChart.PointFillColors
member.summary: Colors for the series points. By default uses the same values as LineColors.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorLineChart.PointSize
member.summary: Diameter of the series points, in pixels.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorLineChart.PointStrokeColors
member.summary: Colors for the outlines of the series points. (#ffffff by default).

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorLineChart.PostUnits
member.summary: Set to a string value (eg: '%') to add a label suffix all y-labels.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorLineChart.PreUnits
member.summary: Set to a string value (eg: '$') to add a label prefix all y-labels.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorLineChart.LineSmoothing
member.summary: Gets/sets a value enable or disable line smoothing.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorLineChart.XLabelFormat
member.summary: A format callback that accepts date objects and formats them for display as x-axis labels. Overrides the default formatter chosen by the automatic labeler or the xLabels option.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorLineChart.XLabelAngle
member.summary: The angle in degrees from horizontal to draw x-axis labels.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorLineChart.XLabels
member.summary: Specifies the x axis labeling interval. By default the interval will be automatically computed.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorLineChart.YLabelFormat
member.summary: A format callback that accepts y-values and formats them for display as y-axis labels.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorLineChart.Ymax
member.summary: Maximum bound for Y-values. Alternatively, set this to 'auto' to compute automatically, or 'auto [num]' to automatically compute and ensure that the max y-value is at least [num].

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorLineChart.Ymin
member.summary: Minimum bound for Y-values. Alternatively, set this to 'auto' to compute automatically, or 'auto [num]' to automatically compute and ensure that the min y-value is at most [num]. Hint: you can use this to create graphs with false origins.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorSeriesChart.Axis
member.summary: Set to false to disable drawing the x and y axis.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorSeriesChart.Grid
member.summary: Set to false to disable drawing the horizontal grid lines.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorSeriesChart.GridTextColor
member.summary: Set the color of the axis labels (default: #888).

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorSeriesChart.GridTextFamily
member.summary: Set the font family of the axis labels (default: sans-serif).

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorSeriesChart.GridTextSize
member.summary: Set the point size of the axis labels (default: 12).

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorSeriesChart.GridTextWeight
member.summary: Set the font weight of the axis labels (default: normal).

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorSeriesChart.HideHover
member.summary: Set to 'False' to always show a hover legend. Set to 'True' or 'Auto' to only show the hover legend when the mouse cursor is over the chart. Set to 'Always' to never show a hover legend.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorSeriesChart.Labels
member.summary: A list of strings containing labels for the data series to be plotted (corresponding to the values in the YKeys option).

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorSeriesChart.XKey
member.summary: A string containing the name of the attribute that contains date (X) values. Timestamps are accepted in the form of millisecond timestamps (as returned by Date.getTime() or as strings in the following formats: •2012 •2012 Q1 •2012 W1 •2012-02 •2012-02-24 •2012-02-24 15:00 •2012-02-24 15:00:00 •2012-02-24 15:00:00.000 Note: when using millisecond timestamps, it's recommended that you check out the dateFormat option. Note 2: date/time strings can optionally contain a T between the date and time parts, and/or a Z suffix, for compatibility with ISO-8601 dates.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.IRazorSeriesChart.YKeys
member.summary: A list of strings containing names of attributes that contain Y values (one for each series of data to be plotted).

member.name: T:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.ChartHoverState
member.summary: A list of values that can specify the hover state of the legend for a chart.

member.name: F:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.ChartHoverState.None
member.summary: The hide hover state is not specified.

member.name: F:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.ChartHoverState.Auto
member.summary: Only show the hover legend when the mouse cursor is over the chart.

member.name: F:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.ChartHoverState.True
member.summary: Only show the hover legend when the mouse cursor is over the chart.

member.name: F:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.ChartHoverState.False
member.summary: Always show a hover legend.

member.name: F:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.ChartHoverState.Always
member.summary: Never show a hover legend.

member.name: T:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorAreaChart
member.summary: Represents a Morris Area chart. Area charts take all the same options as line charts but are shaded under the lines.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorAreaChart.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an instance of a Morris Area.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorAreaChart.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of a Morris Area with the specified ID.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorAreaChart.BehaveLikeLine
member.summary: Gets/sets a value that determines if the items are overlaid on top of each other (true) instead of stacking them (false).

member.name: T:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorBarChart
member.summary: Create Morris bar charts.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorBarChart.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an instance of a Morris Bar Chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorBarChart.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of a Morris Bar Chart with the specified ID.
member.param: The Unique ID of this chart.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorBarChart.BarColors
member.summary: Array containing colors for the series bars.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorBarChart.Stacked
member.summary: Set to true to draw bars stacked vertically.

member.name: T:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorChart
member.summary: Abstract class for all razor charts.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorChart.#ctor(Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorChartType)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of a razor chart.
member.param: The type of chart to create.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorChart.#ctor(System.String,Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorChartType)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of a razor chart of the given type with the specified ID.
member.param: The Unique ID of this chart.
The type of chart to create.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorChart.Library
member.summary: Gets the chart library used by this instance represents.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorChart.Type
member.summary: Gets the type of chart this instance represents.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorChart.DataUrl
member.summary: The URL to the data to plot. This is an array of objects, containing x and y attributes as described by the XKey and YKeys options. Note: ordering doesn't matter here - you can supply the data in whatever order works best for you.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorChart.ChartHeight
member.summary: Gets/sets the height of the div tag to preserve space for the chart. Set this value to null to allow the chart to dynamically size.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorChart.Resize
member.summary: Set to true to enable automatic resizing when the containing element resizes (default: false). This has a significant performance impact, so it is disabled by default.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorChart.SetAttribute(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets or removes the attribute and value.
member.param: The value of the attribute. A null value will remove the attribute.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorChart.SetStyle(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets or removes the style and value.
member.param: The value of the style. A null value will remove the style.

member.name: T:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorChartType
member.summary: This is the base class for all Morris charts.

member.name: F:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorChartType.None
member.summary: The type of chart is not specified.

member.name: F:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorChartType.Area
member.summary: An Area Chart with lines, points and shaded area under the lines.

member.name: F:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorChartType.Line
member.summary: An Line Chart with lines and points.

member.name: F:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorChartType.Donut
member.summary: A circular graph with slices representing the data.

member.name: F:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorChartType.Bar
member.summary: A vertical bar chart.

member.name: T:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorDonutChart
member.summary: Represents a razor donut chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorDonutChart.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of a Morris Donut Chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorDonutChart.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of a Morris Donut Chart with the specified ID.
member.param: The Unique ID of this chart.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorDonutChart.Colors
member.summary: An array of strings containing HTML-style hex colors for each of the donut segments. Note: if there are fewer colors than segments, the colors will cycle back to the start of the array when exhausted.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorDonutChart.Formatter
member.summary: A string format that will translate a y-value into a label for the center of the donut.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorDonutChart.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets/sets the background color of the chart.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorDonutChart.LabelColor
member.summary: Gets/sets the color of the label in the center of the chart.

member.name: T:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart
member.summary: Represents a Morris Line chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an instance of a Morris Line Chart.

member.name: M:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of a Morris Line Chart with the specified ID.
member.param: The Unique ID of this chart.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart.LineColors
member.summary: Array containing colors for the series lines/points.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart.LineWidth
member.summary: Width of the series lines, in pixels.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart.PointFillColors
member.summary: Colors for the series points. By default uses the same values as LineColors.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart.PointSize
member.summary: Diameter of the series points, in pixels.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart.PointStrokeColors
member.summary: Colors for the outlines of the series points. (#ffffff by default).

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart.Ymax
member.summary: Max. bound for Y-values. Alternatively, set this to 'auto' to compute automatically, or 'auto [num]' to automatically compute and ensure that the max y-value is at least [num].

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart.Ymin
member.summary: Min. bound for Y-values. Alternatively, set this to 'auto' to compute automatically, or 'auto [num]' to automatically compute and ensure that the min y-value is at most [num]. Hint: you can use this to create graphs with false origins.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart.LineSmoothing
member.summary: Gets/sets a value enable or disable line smoothing.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart.ParseTime
member.summary: Set to false to skip time/date parsing for X values, instead treating them as an equally-spaced series.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart.PostUnits
member.summary: Set to a string value (eg: '%') to add a label suffix all y-labels.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart.PreUnits
member.summary: Set to a string value (eg: '$') to add a label prefix all y-labels.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart.DateFormat
member.summary: A format string that accepts millisecond timestamps and formats them for display as chart labels.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart.XLabels
member.summary: Specifies the x axis labeling interval. By default the interval will be automatically computed.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart.XLabelFormat
member.summary: A format string that accepts Date objects and formats them for display as x-axis labels. Overrides the default formatter chosen by the automatic labeler or the xLabels option.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart.XLabelAngle
member.summary: The angle in degrees from horizontal to draw x-axis labels.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart.YLabelFormat
member.summary: A string format that accepts y-values and formats them for display as y-axis labels.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart.Goals
member.summary: A list of y-values to draw as horizontal 'goal' lines on the chart.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart.GoalStrokeWidth
member.summary: Width, in pixels, of the goal lines.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart.GoalLineColors
member.summary: Array of color values to use for the goal line colors. If you list fewer colors here than you have lines in goals, then the values will be cycled.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart.Events
member.summary: A list of x-values to draw as vertical 'event' lines on the chart.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart.EventStrokeWidth
member.summary: Width, in pixels, of the event lines.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart.EventLineColors
member.summary: Array of color values to use for the event line colors. If you list fewer colors here than you have lines in events, then the values will be cycled.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart.ContinuousLine
member.summary: When set to false (the default), all null and undefined values in a data series will be ignored and lines will be drawn spanning them. When set to true, null values will break the line and undefined values will be spanned. Note: in v0.5.0, this setting will be removed and the behavior will be to break lines at null values.

member.name: P:Mvc.RazorTools.Charts.RazorLineChart.FillOpacity
member.summary: Change the opacity of the area fill color. Accepts values between 0.0 (for completely transparent) and 1.0 (for completely opaque).

member.summary: This is the base class for the Morris series based charts (line, area and bar).

Note 2: date/time strings can optionally contain a T between the date and time parts, and/or a Z suffix, for compatibility with ISO-8601 dates.
